product.name: Tablet
product.brief_description: Fire HD 10 Tablet | 10.1" 1080p Full HD display, 64 GB, Twilight Blue - with Ads (Previous Generation - 9th)
product.p1: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime delivery.
product.p2: Note: This item is eligible for FREE Click and Collect without a minimum order subject to availability
product.p3: The With Ads option (also known as Special Offers) displays sponsored screensavers on your device's lock screen and in sleep mode.
product.p4: 10.1" 1080p full HD display and 64 GB of internal storage (add up to 512 GB with microSD).
product.p5: Now 30% faster thanks to the 2.0 GHz octa-core processor and 2 GB of RAM.
product.p6: Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos and listening to music with USB-C port for easy charging.
product.p7: Enjoy your favourite apps like BBC iPlayer, Netflix, Disney+, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube and more through the Amazon Appstore (Google Play Store not supported). Subscription fees may apply.
product.p10: 2 MP front- and rear-facing cameras with 720p HD video recording.
